subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira’s two-run home run helped the Yankees starter Masahiro Tanaka extend his regular-season unbeaten streak to 40 games after a shaky start against the Rays.
snippet: Mark Teixeira’s two-run home run helped the Yankees starter Masahiro Tanaka extend his regular-season unbeaten streak to 40 games after a shaky start against the Rays.
